forms.name: Training Needs Analysis Form
forms.description: This form has been set up to collect some extra information on the upcoming trainings. We will collect these answers ANONYMOUSLY, so please share your thoughts without any reservations. The aim here is to make sure we can focus on the best topics for the Learning & Development programs to ensure you guys will learn the most. Please provide some extra details in the open questions - this way, we can tailor your trainings in the best way towards you. We are mostly interested in the specific skills you would like to learn, so please provide answers that showcase the skills you're interested in. It will take about 15-20 minutes to fill out this form. Thanks for your help!

The children _______________ right now.

I ___________ my final exam tomorrow.

 Hint: shows that something started in the past and is continuing at the present time.

SIMPLE FUTURE

Hint: Used to show that an action will take place at a specific time in the future.

I ___________ you the information when I get it. (Hint: offers to do something)

Hint: Used to show that an action will take place at a specific time in the future.

_____________ an actor when I grow up. (Hint: Intends to do something in the future)

A là nhân viên mới vào công ty nên có nhiều việc A gặp khó khăn khi giải quyết. Nhóm của A đang tiến hành thử nghiệm dự án cải tiến trong sản xuất để giảm thiểu chi phí. Thấy vậy, nhóm trưởng và các thành viên còn lại đã động viên các bạn luôn kiên trì với mục tiêu mà nhóm đã đặt ra ban đầu.
